name: marathi
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a language spoken in western India: Marathi is my mother tongue but all my education has been in English. Teaching is done in Urdu and Marathi.
More examplesFewer examplesShe spoke to her parents in Marathi.Soon they became fluent in the local language, Marathi. He chanted alternately in Hindi and Marathi.

in or of the Marathi language: She spoke with a Marathi accent. a Marathi translation of a Bengali book
More examplesFewer examplesHis first Marathi film, Devaki, won him 27 awards.Scores of English loan words have become common in modern Marathi usage.a Marathi word meaning "man of peace"
